INST: In this task, you will be asked to remember a screen full of colored objects, like you see below.  The screen will appear briefly, disappear, and then a new screen will appear.  This new screen may or may not be the same as the previous screen.  Your job is to determine whether they are the same or different. In the example below, the screen won't change when it flashes--it is a SAME trial. Respond to see an example.

INST3: In the test, you will respond to indicate whether trials are SAME or DIFFERENT. The response instructions are shown at the bottom of the screen. You will start with a few practice trials. Press space bar to see another example, or any other key to begin
INST4: Now, you will be tested for real. Try to be as accurate as possible.  Make a response to begin.
